newProperties.name: Video Thumbnail
newProperties.description: URL to video thumbnail: NOTE: Should be an https link to an image of ratio 16:9, ideally 1280 pixels wide by 720 pixels tall, with a minimum width of 640 pixels, in JPEG or PNG format.

newProperties.name: About the Video
newProperties.description: A short description of the video

newProperties.name: Language
newProperties.description: The main language used in the video.

newProperties.name: Year of Release
newProperties.description: The year the video was first released.

newProperties.name: Month of Release
newProperties.description: The month the video was first released.

newProperties.name: Date of Release
newProperties.description: The date the video was first released.

newProperties.name: Link
newProperties.description: A link to the creators page.

newProperties.name: Object
newProperties.description: The entityId of the object in the data directory.

newProperties.name: Publication Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the video.

newProperties.name: Curation Status
newProperties.description: The publication status of the video set by the a content curator on the platform.

newProperties.name: Explicit
newProperties.description: Indicates whether the video contains explicit material.

newProperties.name: License
newProperties.description: The license of which the video is released under.
